name: Masha and the Bear Soccer Game
name_original: Masha and the Bear Soccer Game
description:
Favorite heroes of the popular cartoon "Masha and the Bear" comes back! This time we have to take part in an exciting sports adventure! Masha come up with a new idea! What is it this time?
Fans are cheering, the field is ready! Bear, hurry up! Take position on the goal – let’s start a football match!
A new exciting game with your favorite characters now in your phone! Prepare for the football championship! Improve your skills, practice in different game modes, and become a star of today's match!
The main features of our game:
• Absolutely free game with favorite characters.
• Lots hours of fun on your phone!
• Several interesting game modes!
• Spin the wheel of fortune and get cool cosmetic items for your player!
• Simple and dynamic gameplay!
• Endless and exciting football challenges!

Can you beat the goalkeeper or pass through the defenders? In the new game by Indigo Kids you have to compete football mini-games and become a real football player! Our best friends will accompany us during the game. Bear, Tiger, Himalayan Bear and Wolves are real athletes! Let's beat them all?
We invite everyone to try their luck in the Wheel of Fortune! What kind of football equipment will you get? Prepare yourself for an important football match! Get ready! Score your best winning goal!
So what are you waiting for? A lot of beautiful playgrounds are waiting for you! Forward to the training field to show who is a real football star!
